body:
FWIW if you replace "because" with punctuation it won't sound so
ungrammatical. one of:

    from x[y] at line 91 (key of map put)
    from x[y] at line 91: key of map put

I think the first is probably better. Also please use Lconv's result in
full, even if it means the file name gets printed again. That's consistent
with other errors, and the other errors do it because various IDEs
recognize file:line.
